text: Orval may refer to: * Orval, Cher, a commune of the Cher département in France * Orval, Manche, a commune of the Manche département, in France * Orval Abbey - Abbaye Notre-Dame d'Orval, a Trappist monastery in Belgium ** Orval Brewery, a brewery located in the Trappist Abbaye Notre-Dame d'Orval *** Orval, a beer produced by the brewery in the Trappist Abbaye Notre-Dame d'Orval * Orval H. Caldwell (February 15, 1895–February 18, 1972), Chicago-area painter and one- time president of the Art Institute of Chicago * Orval Faubus, governor of the U.S. state of Arkansas 1955-1967 * Orval Grove, an American baseball player ==See also== *Orville (disambiguation)
title: Orval
